skills:

Strong knowledge and understanding of Scrum principles, practices, and ceremonies.

CSM certified showcasing proficiency in Agile practices and methodologies.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, Visio, and project management tools like Rally.
Outstanding presentation skills, delivering engaging and informative presentations to stakeholders.
